DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to study KOS-862 in men with metastatic prostate cancer who have failed a docetaxel-containing regimen.
DOC.brief_title: Study of KOS-862 (Epothilone D) in Metastatic Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: This study is a Phase 2, single arm study of KOS-862 in men with metastatic prostate cancer who have failed a docetaxel-containing regimen. PSA response is the primary end-point and objective responses will be checked as available.
DOC.criteria: At least 18 years of age. Metastatic disease. One previous treatment including docetaxel (Taxotere). At least 3 weeks since last surgery/radiation/chemotherapy ECOG Performance Status of 0, 1 or 2 Active brain metastases
